3.2.1 Overweight, obesity and co-morbidities
In the WHO European Region, overweight and obesity are responsible for up to 20% of mortality and for around 
10% of the total disease burden, which between 1990 and 2010 increased by two fifths, especially in women of 
reproductive age [68,69]. The prevalence of obesity is rising, and rising fastest in low socioeconomic groups. The 
countries with higher
